synopsis.text: Now living together as a couple, Kei Enjouji and Ranmaru Samejima's relationship is put to the test when Ranmaru discovers lipstick on Kei's chest after a night out drinking with a client. The discovery leads Ranmaru to question Kei's faithfulness, causing him to leave in anger. As they spend the day apart, both men reflect on their past and the bond they formed after first meeting in junior high. With Ranmaru contemplating letting go of their precious memories and Kei following him in an attempt to explain, the future of their relationship hangs in the balance. Will their love for each other be enough to overcome this obstacle, or will it be the end of their journey together?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
